With the right testing and treatment, if needed, an ectopic kidney should cause no serious long-term health problems.",NIDDK,Ectopic Kidney
What to do for Ectopic Kidney ?,"Eating, diet, and nutrition have not been shown to play a role in causing or preventing an ectopic kidney.",NIDDK,Ectopic Kid
